profile:
► Victorious Carpet and Flooring Sales, Installation, Repair, and Carpet Re-Stretching Services ◄
 
▬ Visit us online at → https://www.victoriousflooring.com/
Your Experienced Carpet & Flooring Sales, Installation, Repair & Stretching Services With Satisfaction Guaranteed! 

****

We have solutions for all occasions and budgets! Now select beautiful and less costly carpets from inside your own home or office! Our free Shop-At-Home service lets you choose the right carpet in the comfort of your own place. Make the right choice when viewing samples within your décor and under your lighting conditions. Take advantage of our low-cost overhead now! We'll be happy to assist you in making the right choice for your décor and budget. 
Call us today or e-mail us to book your Shop@Home visit!
 
▬ Things Happen... We Can Help!
We offer a wide range of installation and repair services for common flooring materials across the GTA with no obligation consulting and estimate service. 
 
▬ Top 10 Reasons Why You Should Buy From Us;
1. GTA's Award-Winning Service - Rated Toronto's #1 Carpet Installation Company for the last 14 years in the row 
2. Honest Upfront Pricing - No Hidden Costs. Written Contract, Detailed-Itemized Estimate / Invoicing Provided
3. Computerized Calculation to Optimize Material Usage With Minimum Wastage 
4. Free "Accidental Service Request"
5. Unbeatable Lifetime Labour Warranty 
6. Clear Explanations & Written Pre-Installation Checklist 
7. In-house Installation Service. 
We DON'T Sub-Contract. (Read Competitors & Big Box Stores Fine Print) 
8. Professional / Written Site Inspection 
9. Convenient weekend and evening appointments 
10. Wide Range of Payment Options (Finance, Personal Cheque, Interac E-mail Money Transfer, PayPal, Visa & MasterCard)
 
▬ Buy with confidence! All of our products are DIRECTLY from the manufacturer.
Residential Wall to Wall Carpet Sales, Carpet Installation, Carpet Repairs & Carpet Stretching Services 
A wide range of Berber (Loop), Plush, Patterned, Saxony Carpet Selection.
Now offering inexpensive Basement Carpeting. Full cover Stairs or Runners. Silky soft Bedroom / Living Room Carpeting 
 
▬ We are also specialized in;
• Berber Snag Repairs
• Wrinkled, Bulged & Buckled Carpets (Carpet Stretching Services)
• Irons Burns
• Bleach & Paint Spots
• Pet (Cat, Dog) Damages, and much more!
 
Please feel free to call us at (416) 858-7006 Or visit us at https://www.victoriousflooring.com/
7 days a week for a no-obligation estimate!

services:
We offer a wide range of carpeting services in Toronto including but not limited to Wall to Wall Carpet Sales, Installation, Repairs and Stretching. 
 
Not only supplying you with affordable and competitive priced wall to wall carpets, but also providing expertise repairs for all sorts of carpet issues. 
 
With our satisfaction quarantined service, you will receive a life time labour warranty that covers wrinkling, bulging, split seams, detached edges and anything else related to our craftsmanship. 
 
What’s more, we also include Free of Charge Accidental Service to appreciate your business by choosing us. We won’t let anything stay between you and your newly installed carpet, ensuring you with one of the best “Flawless Customer Service” available for your custom tailored needs.

profile:
Carpet & Rug Retailers, Floor Laying & Refinishing, Floor Retailers

Alliance Floor Source is a Toronto-based hardwood, laminate and carpeting specialist. We sell only top quality merchandise and offer the best brands in the industry.  We offer flooring products for the "do-it-yourselfer" or we can professionally install it for you. In either case, we believe in providing only the best in products and customer service. 
Selecting the appropriate flooring is an investment that will prove to be one of the smartest and most durable you'll make. As one of the most important design elements in any home or business, hardwood, laminate and cork flooring are used everywhere to give warmth, a distinguished look and a timeless beauty to any room. Whether you require a new floor or a retrofit of an existing floor in either a residential or commercial property, we will do our best to find the most suitable option for your particular needs and budget.
We have been satisfying the needs of homeowners, contractors and builders for almost 25 years.  When dealing with Alliance Floor Source you will not only be satisfied with the quality of our products, but you will also love (we hope and trust) the exceptional customer service and our commitment to making your flooring project a most enjoyable experience.
With your cooperation in the after installation care and maintenance of your new floor, you will have an investment to be happy about and be satisfied with for many years to come.

profile:
*** For a quicker response when sending a request email us directly at estimates@newridgerefinishing.com this will better ensure our receiving your request ***
After growing up in a family owned Floor Refinishing business and seeing the pros and cons I wanted to do business differently, better. Because I became aware that as a home owner it can be a challenge to understand everything about the project you’re hiring for and to make the best decision for your needs.



I know as a home owner looking at a floor refinishing project you have concerns about the quality of the job, the time frame as well as the longevity of the finish so you can enjoy the beauty of one of the greatest assets of your home for years.


At NewRidge Refinishing we’ve learned and operate with the understanding that it’s not only how we start a project that’s important to you it’s also how we finish it.



NewRidge Refinishing is comprised of the best contractors in the industry that take pride in their trade, from the quality of machinery to the professional processes and the high standard for materials that are designed to give your floors a lasting finish.



We worry about all the details of preparation, protecting the area outside of the project, cleaning and completing so you can rest knowing that your job will be done as expected and on time.



We work with your general contractor if needed as well have recommendations should you need them to accommodate all of your project needs.



It’s great knowing what to expect and when to expect it when you choose NewRidge refinishing for your floor and stair refinishing needs.



Services Offered:
Hardwood Floor Refinishing, 
Screen and Coat (aka "Buff and Coat"), 
Stair Case Refinishing (including treads, risers, railings, spindles and stringers), 
Stair Case Tread and Riser Installation, 
Hardwood Repair 
Hardwood Installation
Railing System Installation – Iron or Wood
Furniture Refinishing & Repair 
Stair Builders
Laminate Floor Installation



Specialties:
Hardwood Floor Refinishing, Screen and Coat (aka "Buff and Coat"), Stair Case Refinishing (including treads, risers, railings, spindles and stringers), Stair Case Tread and Riser Installation, Hardwood Repair and Hardwood Installation



Some of the Brands we Use:
Fabulon Urethanes, Torcan Urethanes,Streetshoe Waterbase Urethanes,
Emulsion Urethanes,Bona Products, Minwax Stains, Benjamin Moore Stains, Sherwin Williams Stains, Dura Seal Stains, Pratt & Lambert Stains, Galaxy Sanding Machines

With operations in Hamilton & North Toronto we Serve the following Areas:

Hamilton, Brantford, Burlington, Oakville, Grimsby, Niagara Falls, St. Catherine's, Welland

Most GTA & York Region areas including Toronto, North York, Scarborough, Vaughn, Markham, Richmond Hill, Newmarket, Aurora, Georgina, Keswick

Durham County including Pickering, Ajax, Whitby, Oshawa & Brooklin

All of Simcoe County and Parts of Muskoka including Bradford, Innisfil, Barrie, Orillia

Kitchener, Waterloo, Cambridge, Guelph, Stratford, Fergus 

Norfolk County, Haldimand County, Port Dover, Simcoe, Caledonia, Port Colborne

profile:
The Perfect Painter is resuming operations and scheduling free estimates for all your Residential and Painting Needs

We are pleased to announce that all Residential renovations are deemed essential, both new and ongoing renovations including painting can continue as per the Provincial Government.

We have also expanded our service areas to include Burlington, Oakville, Milton, Mississauga, Brampton, Toronto, Vaughan, Markham, Newmarket, Aurora, Stouffville, Pickering and Oshawa.

We are GTA'S Top Professional Painting company, with highly skilled trades and a great reputation for customer service. We specialize in Interior & Exterior Painting, Custom Cabinet Refinishing, Staining  and  Staircase Refinishing . We are experts in residential homes and commercial offices. We do complete Home Renovations and we are a licenced General Contractor all in one. We have 3 divisions,  Perfect Painter, Perfect Handyman & Affinity Home Renovations, we are your "One Stop Shop" for all your renovation needs.. We are the only company in Toronto and GTA market that provides Full Services on almost all aspects of Home Renovations within one Team. We have award winning customer service and pride ourselves on making everything right. Having one team that is responsible for all your home or commercial renovation has great value both from quality, accountability and scheduling. From design and build and to as little as our 4 hour handyman repair service, we can accommodate all your needs.

We are the fastest growing Painting and Home Renovation Company in Toronto and the GTA. Our Handymen and Home Renovation Divisions are all Full Service. We have 24 exceptional Professional Painters hand-picked  and 22  finished carpenters/handyman/skilled trades, they are also Hand-picked. We only hire the best people possible and stand behind all work we do. From small Painting jobs to Handyman Jobs to painting your home and office, we can accommodate all your needs.  Our renovation teams  can complete full condo to home renovations even from the Design and build stages with our skilled staff. Our  highly skilled Field Managers bring an average of 20 years of Construction experience and renovation experience to our company.  We have a real warranty, we will come back and fix something without the fear of people not answering your call or making excuses, we stand behind the work we do.
 
Perfect Painters can provide you with certified color consultants and interior designers. We recommend the best quality paints from Sherwin William, Benjamin Moore or Dulux. We also understand that painting prices need to be competitive and we will always compete to earn your business and trust.  
 
 
We offer our customers the opportunity to purchase paint at our wholesale prices. Perfect Painter is a  custom painting company,  but we don’t charge a custom price. We want to grow our business long term so that we will become the house painters for you and your family. Do not forget to look at our Painting Specials and remember we provide our painting services in the following communities: Aurora, , Brampton, Burlington, Bolton, Caledon, King City, Mississauga, Milton, Maple, Georgetown, Oakville, Richmond Hill, Markham, Vaughan, Etobicoke, Toronto and all of the GTA. We are your Painting company in the GTA.
 


Perfect Painter’s take pride in performing our work to exceed your standard. We will leave your commercial or residential space clean and tidy so it is usable for your clients and family after we have completed our assignment. Please allow us to visit your site/home/office and provide you with an accurate free estimate. We can advise you on the painting work that will be required at that time and make suggestions on color, decor and finishes. Our painting quotes contain a detailed breakdown of costs and the specific work to be done, the painting materials, and an estimate of the amount of time the painting will take. We are also able to offer other services such as drywall and taping at a fraction of the cost of other companies. Prompt, reliable and efficient services – we assure our clients the best quality painting job for your home or your business. 
 
 
 
At Perfect Painter, we have full liability insurance and our staff is covered by WSIB. Most companies fail to meet this criteria almost 83% of the time.
 
Remember you home is typically your largest asset so don’t take chances on losing it by fly by night companies. We understand our business is competitive and we will earn your business each and every time.

profile:
At Invision Hardwood & Decor we are more than your average hardwood floor retailers, we bring a unique expertise. Our spacious showroom offers a look into the possibilities of a complete room makeover. 
Hardwood flooring in combination with our complementary specialties which include painting, decorative trim mouldings, stairs can transform an average space into a spectacular retreat for your everyday enjoyment.
A simple home improvement crafted by our qualified trades can add significant value to home ownership. 
We call this “Interior Vision”, and it’s a complimentary service we offer exclusively to our customers.

Our flooring brands create a luxurious backdrop by design and include; 
Mercier Wood flooring, Lauzon Distinctive Wood Floors, Superior Wood Flooring, Kentwood Floors, Craft Artisan Wood Floors, several vinyl collections, Torlys Smart Floor, Twelve Oaks flooring,

Our services include;
FLOORING- Hardwood Installation, Hardwood Refinishing, Hardwood Repairs. 

STAIRCASES- Stair and Railing replacement or refinishing - Carpet to hardwood- New Pickets and Posts -  Stained, sealed and painted .

FINISHING TRIM- Baseboards, Shoe Moulding or Quarter Rounds.

PAINTING & STAINING- Take the full experience of Invisions capabilities using our professional painter services to complete your look.

Let our "Interior Vision" work for you. Hope to hear from you soon.

profile:
COVID-19 Update: We open for business and available for phone calls, emails and virtual meetings as well. We're also taking all health and safety percautions for our employees and homeowners that we're in contact with. Contact us today to discuss things further. Be safe and take care. 

****

Ideal Stairs is your #1 choice for renovating staircases. Our company has been in the staircase renovation business since 2001. We serve Toronto, Greater Toronto and surrounding areas. With our expertise, we consider ourselves to be fine woodworkers, working daily with Red Oak wood – 100% Canadian content sourced from Quebec. We buy the raw materials and when possible, manufacture our own components, allowing us to pass along the savings to our consumers.

****

Are you interested in Jatoba and Walnut stairs? We also have great knowledge and experience working with these types of wood, and other exotic woods. With our custom manufacturing facility and skilled installation crews, your carpeted stairs can be transformed in about 3-5 days.  We also install flooring and by coordinating this with the staircase renovation, the time and disruption in your home can be minimized. Ideal Stairs can help make your staircase the showpiece of your home.
service_area:
Toronto, Greater Toronto Area (GTA) and surrounding areas

Durham Region - Ajax, Oshawa, Pickering, Whitby

York Region - Aurora, Markham, Newmarket, Richmond Hill, Stouffville, Thornhill, Vaughan, Woodbridge

Peel Region - Brampton, Mississauga, Oakville, Burlington, Caledon
products:
[.::STAIRCASES::.]
Our core business is fine woodworking. We custom manufacture all elements related to the staircase industry. We make posts, treads (steps), balustrades (spindles or pickets), handrails as well as entire staircases made only from red oak. Combining the custom manufacturing facility along with skilled installation crews allow us to renovate your staircase in approximately 3-5 days. Visit our website www.idealstairs.ca to view our Testimonials, and listen to very satisfied clients who have generously allowed us to record their successful renovation in their own words.
 

[.::FLOORING - HARDWOOD AND LAMINATE::.]
Staircase renovation is not our only product. We believe we are the only staircase manufacturer that will renovate your staircase AND install hardwood flooring. We want to minimize the time and disruption in your home by coordinating these two products. We are dealers for many brands of hardwood and laminate flooring but our proudest boast is we have hardwood flooring that is 25% and 100% Canadian content. We offer custom colours on your hardwood flooring (over 750 square feet) for Red Oak and Maple. We value our premium service by supplying and ensuring the colour you choose for your flooring is also used on the renovated staircase.
 

[.::SANDING AND STAINING::.]
If you already have a solid oak staircase but you want it changed to a different colour, we also provide sanding and re-staining services. We can transform your builder staircase into a dream staircase easily within your budget. While you are considering changing the colour of your staircase, this is an excellent time to change the appearance. Since we will be taking off the handrail, pickets and posts to sand and stain your steps, take the opportunity to install another post style, such as square, remodel your existing pickets and changing the look from old to new. For the record
services:
Ideal Stairs offer excellent and professional service in new stair construction, sanding, custom staining and renovating your existing hardwood staircase (oak or maple) right in your home. If you currently have carpeted stairs, we can help transform your staircase to solid oak treads. 

We can change your posts, add new pickets and match the material to an existing colour in your house. Within 3 days, your central foyer is transformed from great to amazing.

Our service is not only limited to stairs. We can also sand and offer custom staining and refinishing of hardwood flooring.

Flooring installation including oak and maple hardwood, laminate and engineered.

Visit our website www.idealstairs.ca for more information.

profile:
The Home Improvement Group is the premier One Stop Shop for all of your home and office renovations needs.  We have multiple divisions such as Perfect Painter, Affinity Renovations, Perfect Handyman and formally  Mr. Rescue to service all your needs. 

We service work form $400.00 to $500,000.00+ from our Painter and Handyman of the Day Service to  Home Additions and Major Renovation and Structural work.   We want to earn your trust and as a family owned business that delivers on providing outstanding home/office renovation work. 

Not convinced we have enough renovation reviews please see Perfect Painters & Home Renovations Services for a more detailed list on reviews.

We have a commitment to Quality work and dealing with a no risk contractor and we will always compete for your business.


We have also expanded our service areas to include Burlington, Oakville, Milton, Mississauga, Brampton, Toronto, Vaughan, Markham, Newmark, Aurora, Stouffville, Pickering and Oshawa.

Call or email us at sales@thig.pro for all your renovation needs

profile:
We cover the whole of the GTA and beyond and carry most major brands of hardwood, laminate, carpet, tile and vinyl. We are also ICC (Insurance Claims Collaborative) registered for restoration of damaged floors.
 
Why not pop in to our showroom in Newmarket or Thornhill  where you can see our collection first hand, along with current special offers, or visit www.floorsdirectnorth.ca
 
We offer a shop-at-home service, first-class customer care and a friendly smile. Our customers are important to us and whilst we aren't perfect, we try hard and pride ourselves on the care and attention we give to every project. Our installers are masters in their fields and you can rest assured you'll be very happy with the installation of your chosen flooring. 
 
We also specialize in custom made stairs. 
 
You can also visit our second location 
134 Doncaster Ave
Units 1 & 2
Thornhill
905 235 7155

profile:
Love Your Stairs founded in 2003, also known as the Toronto Stair Runner Company, is a creative leader in developing Stair Runner ideas. Love Your Stairs transforms your ideas in to reality. Love Your Stairs carries an artisanal approach to our work by having an expert understanding of stair runners, stair refinishing, carpet runners, stair rebuilding, stair repair, carpet installation, laminate flooring, and hardwood flooring.
Love Your Stairs company has grown over the years through word of mouth referrals. We are a family sized business that always remains utterly personalized in our approach with clients and execution of work by closely monitoring and maintaining the optimum quality of workmanship in stair rebuilding and stair refinishing. 
We offer the best selection of stair runners & carpets including a variety of services including stair refinishing, carpet runners, stair rebuilding, stair coverings, carpet runners for stairs, carpet for stairs, and stair repair. Love Your Stairs has a wide range including stair runners & carpets of all kinds, from carpet runners to custom rugs & wall-to-wall flooring. Our carpet designs include but not limited to a large selection of modern, stripped, geometric, natural & oriental styles of stair runner carpets to match your personality and to fulfill your home décor needs.

profile:
Welcome to SB HARDWOOD FLOORING & STAIRS. We’re a two-generation family owned business and we pride ourselves on excellent workmanship and outstanding customer service. Since our inception, our commitment has been to provide quality hardwood stairs & flooring services. With over 26 years of combined experience we’ll help you select the perfect type of flooring and stairs, every step of the way.

***

We’ve built our reputation one customer at a time, taking the necessary measures to work through the many options and possibilities related to flooring. The end result is a personalized flooring concept guaranteed to meet your expectations!
We work on residential and commercial projects with home owners in private homes and condominiums in the Ontario GTA. We supply, install, sand, repair and refinish hardwood floors and stairs.

profile:
TipTop Flooring Inc. provides residential and commercial hardwood flooring services in the Greater Toronto area. We are a locally owned and operated flooring company that takes pride in its work. 

Our main objective is to help you make an educated decision about your hardwood flooring installation and refinishing needs.

We want you to be happy and will do all we can to ensure that you are comfortable referring our services to your family and friends. We will answer any questions you may have and provide you with an honest and accurate estimate for your flooring project.

SERVICES OFFERED 
Hardwood Floor Refinishing, Hardwood Floor Installation, Buff and recoat, Stair Case Refinishing (including treads, risers, railings, spindles and stringers), Stair Case Tread and Riser Installation, Hardwood Repair Hardwood Installation Railing System Installation
service_area: At TipTop Flooring, we provide professional flooring services to people living in the Greater Toronto Area (GTA). That includes the communities of Aurora, Brampton, Maple,Markham, Mississauga, New Market, North York, Oakville, Richmond Hill, Scarborough, Thornhill, and Vaughan.
services:
We offer the following services:
- Hardwood refinishing
- Hardwood floor sanding and refinishing 
- Refinishing hardwood stairs 
- Refinishing old hardwood floors
- Parquet sanding
- Floor resurfacing 
- Staining wood floors
- Buffing and Coating
- Hardwood installation
- Installation of laminate flooring
- Parquet flooring installation
- Engineered hardwood flooring installation
- Cork flooring installation

profile:
Unique Flooring G.T.A. is one of the most prominent flooring and tile companies in the GTA. Our goal is to provide the most outstanding quality for our customers. We offer a wide range of services in flooring and tile. From the smallest job to the most detailed one, we carefully plan every step of the process, offering a free consultation for the costumer to receive the best for the most affordable price.
Could your floors use some updating? At Unique Flooring GTA, we believe that the right flooring can shape the look and feel of any space. As an established flooring contractor in Scarborough, ON, our goal is to consistently offer our customers high quality flooring and impeccable service.
A SOLID INVESTMENT
Updated flooring is a worthwhile investment in any home or business. When you work with a flooring contractor from our team, you'll get a knowledgeable, dedicated professional who will take the time to understand your needs and present you with a variety of options. Whether you're looking for high-end flooring or have simpler tastes, we're prepared to work within your budget and timeline so that you come away satisfied. As a customer of ours, you'll benefit from:
• A wide range of flooring materials and products
• Quality workmanship
• Prompt, reliable service
To set up a consultation with a flooring contractor from Unique Flooring GTA, call us today at 647-646-8339 phone number.

We are a contractor with focus of residential FLOORING and STAIR works. Unlike other contractor who assign their crews to do all kind of flooring works, we assign specific crews to do specific flooring installation to ensure the quality.

- Supply & installation Hardwood, Laminate, and Vinyl flooring

profile:
GreenValley Flooring is the GTA's ONE STOP SHOP for all of your Flooring Needs.

We supply:

-Solid Hardwood
-Engineered Wood
-Laminate
-Vinyl
-Stairs and Railings
-Custom Wide Plank, and Reclaimed Flooring

Established in 2003, GreenValley has grown to become a leader in supplying quality flooring products to homeowners, builders, and contractors alike across the GTA. What is our secret?

Simple:
GREAT QUALITY, GREAT PRICES, AND GREAT SERVICE!

GreenValley Flooring is pleased to offer unique and designer friendly flooring choices, specializing in wide plank, handscraped, wirebrushed, and reclaimed "antique" hardwood floors, as well as a full line of exotic species in various colours and styles.

GreenValley flooring also offers competitively priced professional installation services. And our fully licensed and bonded crews also specialize in "sand on site" staining and finishing, stair capping and refinishing, and baseboard\trim installations.

We invite you to come in today and see why thousands of satisfied customers have chosen GreenValley Flooring to supply their homes with quality flooring products.

profile:
Toronto Flooring Solutions Inc. has over 30 years of experience in the flooring business we offer our clients a tailored service that is unmatched in both value and quality. We are conveniently located near Downtown Toronto and offer free parking to our clients.
We carry a large variety of flooring products from your traditional solid hardwood to engineered, cork, leather, bamboo, carpet and many other flooring solutions to meet all your needs in both commercial and residential applications.
We work with some of the most trusted brands in the flooring industry and stand behind our partners in both integrity and value.
Our sales teams have many years of experience working closely with contractors and interior designers in helping to manage the installation process from start to completion.
Our project managers have worked with some of the biggest designers and architects in the city. We pride ourselves of making sure the project goes in smoothly and completed on time.
We value the importance of trust when it comes to your home. This is why we treat every project large or small with the same importance. Our sales teams do not work on commission, which allows for a pressure free environment when the time comes to make the transaction. We also understand the nature of construction and know it can be challenging at times, this is why we appoint a project manager for each installation. This gives you the opportunity to work with one person from start to finish, which will help avoid misunderstandings and delays in getting the project completed.

profile:
Tfc Flooring Group will help you find the floor that best matches your taste, lifestyle and budget. We offer different stain colours that can be applied to raise the natural grain of the wood and compliment other wood furnishings and decor ideas within the home. Also we make custom stain that could match the stain colour you have.
What we do?

We specialize in sanding, staining and refinishing of hardwood floors and stairs. Our professional crews handle all installations, sanding, staining, finishing and repairs of existing floors while always providing quality workmanship and excellent service. Older floors can be restored to their original beauty by sanding and refinishing. We are fast, professional, and unbelievably affordable. And most importantly, you will get the floor you love.

profile: AP design Living company has been established on 2019 to cover the hight demand on interior renovation providing service on Staircases renovation, refinishing, recapping,  hardwood flooring refinishing & installation, kitchen cabinets refinishing & refacing. We work with types of wood like Red Oak , White Oak , Maple , Walnut. With our installation experience your carpeted stairs can be transformed within 3 to 5 days coordinating with your new flooring installation at the same time minimized your time. AP Design Living can make your staircase the first impression of your home. Let us do the transformation for you!
products:
*solid wood: steps , balusters, spindles, posts, nosing, handrail. unfinished & pre-finished hardwood floor
*metal, iron pickets, multiple designs .
engineered flooring, melamine, vinyl, 
oil base stain and oil base varnish 
water base stain and water base varnish 
custom stains
services:
Stairs refinishing: If the steps are in good condition it is not necessary to spend on new steps, instead we will just sand it down and apply new stain and varnish. We will remove all the old posts and spindles in order to properly sand the steps, and  have it stain and refinish therefore  we highly recommend after all to install new wood posts and new iron pickets or new wood  spindles, this way You will have a brand new stairway renovated within your bagged . Let us do that transformation for you 

Stairs recapping: If the stairs is carpeted or in a bad conditions the option is to install new solid wood steps and new risers. We will rip off  the old carpeted clean and prepare for the new solid wood steps to be install, this way you will have a brand new staircase on place and  along with a new iron pickets, new posts, new handrail, ending with a brand new Stairway. Let us do that transformation for you 

flooring: we offer installation labor of hardwood floor, laminate, vinyl, engineered floor, glue it down , Glue Assist Methods. If your hardwood floor is an a good condition it can be refinish, sand it down have it stain and finish  . Turning your carpeted and old floors  into a brand new floors. Let us do that transformation for you.

Kitchen Cabinets: painting, sanding, and refinishing its a good option when it comes to your kitchen cabinets saving like that time and under your bagged. We can turn your old looking Kitchen in to a luxury one just by painting or staining at your favorite color. Let us do that transformation for you.

Products : We use hight end quality acrylic paints from Benjamin Moore to have our kitchen cabinets painted with a grade results and durability , we use water base and oil base stains and varnishes for our finishing, we customize the stains to match any color.

profile:
At TERĀIN Landscaping Construction Inc., our client-centric approach focuses on creating the best customer experience on every project. Whether it is designing a new walkway to guide the path home or cleaning up an area of the backyard that lacks flow, our team is dedicated to providing excellent craftsmanship to reinvigorate even the most complex spaces. Our construction keeps longevity in mind, as clients continue to feel satisfied with project outcomes well into the future.

While TERĀIN Landscaping Construction Inc. is fairly new, our passionate, organized and hardworking team brings over 10 years of experience to the table. Needless to say, we are motivated to ensure that each client is 100% satisfied. If you can dream it, we can elaborate on the vision through innovative design ideas that translate a simple idea to a stunning reality. 

Explore our professional drone footage and navigate through our reviews to see for yourself.

profile:
Royal Hardwood Refinishing specializes in refinishing and installation of hardwood, laminate, vinyl, and flooring in the GTA and beyond. We have been operating since 2010 and are a reputable and trustworthy company in Ontario. We consistently use high-end products to offer you the best quality at an affordable price compared to competitors.
Our company only hires qualified employees with extra training to ensure that we can satisfy each customer every day. We deliver quality work using our professional equipment and technology to provide excellent service.


We offer free estimates and quote to make your life easier, so simply give us a call!

Complete Flooring Repair Services

• Hardwood floor restoration

• Hardwood floor refinishing

• Hardwood floor sanding

• Hardwood floor staining including oil-based and water-based.

profile:
Dorval Homes is a high-end custom building company specializing in new homes, additions, and renovations in the Greater Toronto Area.  With over 10 years in the GTA, our rich heritage isn’t to be understated – and discerning homeowners and leading architects have come to rely on Dorval Homes for exquisite attention to detail and comprehensive knowledge of master home-building.  

The happiness of our customers is our singular goal.  Creating joy in our customers’ experience is the byproduct of combining our superior building systems with a rugged moral code emphasizing honesty and fairness.  

Dorval Homes is highly conscious of a project timeline and budget and has proven methods for delivering on both.  These advantages are conveyed to each client through a dedicated team and a highly transparent project management process.  

Additionally, Dorval Homes' 3-year warranty reflects our higher level of service after the job is done, as well as confidence in our craftsmanship.  This means that if there is any follow-up work, or request, long after a project has been completed, we promptly take care of it.  Think of us as your long-term, accountable partner.

profile:
About Us
Hausvio Inc is a leading Toronto-based home renovations company. We pride ourselves on our eco-friendly, innovative, and professional approach to all of our home renovation projects. From a brand new kitchen or bathroom to whole house projects, our team works hard to transform your living spaces completely.
​
We believe in a more personal approach to home renovation projects. By working closely with our clients, understanding their goals, and working hard to craft solution-focused designs allows us to create beautifully crafted, functional living spaces.
OUR TEAM
The Hausvio is made of professional, experienced carpenters with over a decade in the industry. Each member is well-known and admired in their field for exceptional quality, attention to detail, and talent. We also collaborate with other local professionals, including Architects, Engineers, Kitchen & Bathroom Designers, Electricians, Plumbers, and other specialized personnel, to guarantee we are providing the highest level of service and care for our clients.

MEET THE FOUNDER
Owner/ CEO Wilson is a Licenced Professional Engineer with over five years of experience in the home renovation field. Wilson is passionate about implementing the best methods and practices to help reduce Hausvio’s carbon footprint.

Hausvio is pursuing a LEED (Leadership in Energy and Environmental Design) Certificate. LEED is the most widely used green building rating system in Canada and across the globe. LEED is a proven and holistic path to addressing climate change. At Hausvio, we’re committed to creating more resource-efficient, healthy, and resilient homes without compromising design aesthetics, quality, or living convenience.

WHY GO GREEN
Protects Our Ecosystem: Efficient Use of Resources & Energy
Healthier Indoor Environment: Improved Quality of Life
Energy-Efficient: Reduced Operational Cost and Maintenance
Lower Maintenance and Operation Costs
Reduces Strain on Local Resources
services:
Our Services
Your home should perfectly reflect your style, taste, and lifestyle. We listen to your needs, goals, and visions and flawlessly align them with the best building practices to deliver the best possible outcomes for your living spaces.
Kitchen
The kitchen is the heartbeat of the home. At Hausvio, we create kitchens that work for your family, design choices, and your way of living. From contemporary and modern renovations to open concepts and traditional styles, Hausvio works with you to create beautiful, functional kitchens that complement your home’s aesthetic. 
 
Bathroom
Create a luxurious sanctuary in your home. Bathrooms are a place where you can relax, refresh, and rejuvenate. Our team has experience remodeling various bathroom styles, including ensuites, power rooms, and main bathrooms. Whether you want to create a spa-like oasis with a thermostatic shower system or just refresh your cabinetry, our team can help. 
Whole House
Let us help you make your house a home. If you need significant upgrades to your living space to make it work for you and your family, we offer complete house renovations. Typically, whole house renovations include major elements like the kitchen, bathrooms, interior finishes, flooring, and mechanical systems (electrical, plumbing, and HVAC). 
Basement
Finished basements add additional living space while significantly increasing your property value. We offer fully customizable basement renovations to fit your needs. Our team can add vital functional living space and much-needed storage to upgrade your lifestyle. To add even more value to your home, talk to us about including sub-flooring, lighting, a wet bar, laundry room, built-ins, and upgrading insulation.
warranty_terms: Yes. 6 Months on Workmanship.  Kindly ask for more details.

profile:
Epoxy garage floors are exceptionally resilient and durable so they can withstand heavy equipment, machinery and high traffic. 
The epoxy coating is also very tough against impacts, stains, cracks, chemicals and surface abrasions.

Purpose and Advantages:
✅ Waterproofing
✅ Slip resistant
✅ Easy to clean
✅ Resists motor spills
✅ Durable for high traffic
✅ Heavy equipment and daily use of any machinery industry
✅ Withstands up to -45°c
✅ Smooth and satisfying finish

We cover:
☑️ Garages
☑️ Shops
☑️ Parking lots
☑️ Warehouses
☑️ Staircases
☑️ Locker rooms
☑️ Balconies
☑️ Etc.

We guarantee the service provided against defects in materials and workmanship for a period of 36 months from the date of installation.

profile:
Unik Flooring Inc was created to serve one goal: offer a unique flooring installation of the highest quality available in the GTA – while remaining entirely flexible with its prices.

Our installers are experts in their field and thrive to offer the most Unik work in your home.

Services
Floor Installation: Vinyl
Vinyl floors are a popular option among homeowners, particularly in kitchen and bathroom applications. They are water-and stain-resistant, versatile, and provide good durability for the cost.

Floor Installation: Engineered Hardwood
Engineered hardwood flooring is designed to reduce moisture associated with conventional hardwood. It provides added stability to your floor, will not swell or warp, making it very low maintenance.

Floor Installation: Solid Hardwood

Floor Installation

profile: We are a broad spectrum Construction Company that started as a painting company and grew into general construction company, specialising in all of interior renovations / remodeling. We are serving all of Ontario for over 10 years. We have been performing different works in Luxuries Hotels, Residential Homes, Custom Homes, Occupied/Vacant Apartment Buildings, Offices, Restoring Fire Hydrants, Large cargo containers etc. We serve Provincial and Federal Governments, Regional Municipalities, Institutions, Developers, Privet Home Owners, Builders and so on. Our customers are: Defence Contraction Canada, County Of Lambton, Kingston & Frontenac Housing Corporation, Region of Waterloo etc. Working in multimillion custom homes requires a very high standard of workmanship, which we possess and successfully apply on all of our projects. We are very flexible company and can always accommodate extra work, and accelerate if needed to finish ahead of schedule. We have very qualified personal with very diverse working experience which in turn makes our company very adaptive to non-standard tasks.

profile: Masterbuild windows and doors established in 1999 in toronto  . We provide professional instalation services on windows and doors replacement all across  GTA   .  Which includes building bay windows ,  brick  and concrete cut outs ,   aluminum glass enclosures , European tilt and turn windows , comertial windows and doors , garage doors , interior doors. multiple windows styles and glass options , triple glass with LowE glass and argon gas , foam field vinyl windows frames and more . All types and styles  of exterior doors  from steel and fiberglass doors to a solid wood doors with any style of stained glass designs  or wrought iron Disign finished any colour , with  any type of trim  and with hundreds of hardware choices to choose from   . Our locally  manufactured windows and doors all comes with highest energy ratings in canada . And all been tested for wind , water , heat , cold and pressure by energy star  . All of our windows and doors are installed by our in house friendly licensed insured and certified installers  with minimum of 15 years experience in a trade and compliments by a life time warranty  , one of the best warranties on the market  today . We provide a free no obligation in home professional  consultations or a tour at our showroom  . We have thousands of Successfully completed projects across ontario in the last over 20 years with thousands of  satisfied home owners . Call  us now to get best results , guaranteed energy savings and a pleasant windows and doors replacement experience .

profile:
PLT Flooring is one of the most competitive companies in the GTA in terms of quality and prices. We are unique, as we work solely on a Shop at Home basis read more This way, we maximize our savings that are then passed on to our customers. 

We are specialized in installation and refinishing of hardwood floors and stairs.   Also we provide professional and custom renovation Services for all your inside remodeling projects, including basement, kitchen, bathroom and all areas of your house. And we’ll make it happen at a price you’ll love too.
services:
We believe that a renovation company is first and foremost a Customer Service organization. We’d like to handle all of the tough details: the ordering, the measuring, the delivery management, the installer management, quality control, communication and in the end we strongly believe our team will give you the best experience possible.

When you choose PLT Services, you receive professional, prompt and courteous services in all aspects of interior home improvement like but not limited to:
 
Basement finishing
Bathroom remodeling
Kitchen remodeling
Remove - build walls, partitions
Hardwood, engineer, laminate floor installation sanding and repair
Staircase installation and restoration
Doors, trims installation
Tile- stone installation
Painting
Plumbing
Electrical

profile:
We consistently strive to provide our wonderful clients the best interior home painting experience. Our friendly painting contractors provide top-quality interior painting in an exceptionally timely manner. We offer free no-obligation home improvement consultations in Toronto and the GTA. During the consultation, we use our wealth of expertise to provide you with an accurate estimate and to help you find the perfect paint colours that will enhance the beauty and value of your home. We offer a full suite of interior painting services: drywall installation and repair, ceiling, door, trim, and wall painting, popcorn ceiling removal, staircase painting and refinishing, and wallpaper installation. From condominiums to single-detached houses, we have the professional experience and equipment to deliver a precise and clean job.

Give us a call today at 365-688-2945.

profile:
Delight Flooring: The most dramatic change you can make in your house is flooring. Quality, professionally installed flooring adds an air of sophistication, style and comfort. Often times, it can be the very last piece of the puzzle to make a house feel like a home.

Whether you're ready for a change, updating an out-of-style home or embarking on a complete reno, Delight Flooring Inc. has a variety of products available to suit your needs plus the experts to install it for you. From soft, plush carpets, to sharp-looking hardwood and laminate, you have the option of choosing from all our flooring products. And if you're unsure of what you're looking for, no problem! Our professional staff are happy to help you establish your vision for your home and pick out the perfect product, all complimentary to your existing decor through a shop-at-home consultation. Our professional flooring and carpet consultants work with you every step of the way. With customer satisfaction being our number one concern, at Delight Flooring we offer expert installation and only high quality product.

You no longer have to cringe at the thought of what's underneath your living room's outdated shag carpet. Let the experts at Delight Flooring handle it for you and add the final touches to make you fall in love with your home again.
products:

Laminate flooring
Hardwood Stairs

services: WE DO ANY KIND OF INSTALLATION THAT YOU CAN IMAGINE, FROM INLAYS TO REPAIRS OF OLD FLOORS.  ALSO WE SAND, STAIN AND COAT FLOORS AS WELL
specialities: OFTEN WE WORK IN THE OLDER SECTIONS OF TORONTO.  THIS CALLS FOR A LOT OF REPAIRS TO EXISTING OLD FLOORS. NOW WE ARE WORKING SOLELY WITH WATER BASED FINISHES WITH VERY LOW VOC EMISSIONS.

Our services focuses on the Restoration, Cleaning, Polishing, Protecting Marble Floors and any other kind of Natural Stone such as: Travertine, Limestone, Slate, Granite, etc.

profile:
Dynamic Flooring Concepts Ltd, is a GTA based supplier and distributor of high quality tiles and tiling supplies. With a wide selection of ceramic, glass, porcelain and more, we have the tiles and all of the additional items that you need for renovation projects of any size. We pride ourselves on being the best tile store in Toronto because of our attentive customer service and our amazing product selection. Come and visit our showroom to see our stock of beautiful tiles and have any of your questions answered by our staff.

We can handle orders of any size, from a small shower re-tiling project to a massive flooring job in a store or a shopping mall. Dynamic Flooring Concepts, Ltd is ready to advise and supply any undertaking. Our knowledgeable staff members have years of experience and an expertise on all of the products that we offer. We are happy to answer any questions you may have about tiles, installation products, procedures, as well as offer advice and estimates as needed.

Serving customers in Toronto as well as the surrounding areas, we work hard to keep up with the demands and changes that reflect the growing tile market. Here at Dynamic Flooring Concepts Ltd, our tile selection is much larger than in any other tile store. Our stock and pricing catalog is extensive but please be sure to ask our helpful staff about any unique products you may be looking for or if there’s something that you don’t see on the catalog.

As the top quality supplier of granite, porcelain, glass, ceramic, slate, limestone, and marble tiles of all sizes, it’s our greatest mission to help you finish your tiling projects on time and on budget. With great pricing, a wide selection of tile sizes and styles, a knowledgeable team of staff members who are here to assist you, and delivery all across Canada, we are the fastest growing tile store in the city.

profile:
Magic Touch Flooring ltd. has been a leading provider of flooring services for our valued customers for almost 15 years. Our expanding line of quality flooring products makes it easier and faster for you to improve the beauty and value of your home.

Customer satisfaction is our priority. We ensure the right solution for your flooring needs by providing range products of carpet, hardwood, laminate, vinyl tiles and carpet installation. We pride ourselves in providing any kind of repairs to your old carpet, and don’t forget about our next day installation.

As we consider our customer’s highest treatment, and special discounts for our seniors.

Because Magic Touch Flooring ltd is an exceptional partner for your flooring improvement needs, we proudly offer free estimates, highest quality products, professional consultation, and best Prices that match your budget.

Our Convenient shop at home service will help you add style and inspiration to your home. When viewing samples within your décor, you will be able to match colors, fabrics to ensure the right choice.

Liability, Honesty, and customer satisfaction are the main goal of our business. Our experienced and professional installers will handle every job with care, answer your questions and address your concerns.

If you’re looking to add warmth and quiet Magic Touch to your home, Magic Touch Flooring ltd . is a wise choice! Call now: 416-566 4161

Professional Caulking Contractor in GTA Toronto

Omega Renovations experts provide high quality, professional caulking, home renovation, painting and deck building services across Toronto and GTA. Being one of the leading names in the caulking and sealing business, Omega Renovations is a company you can rely on.

Exterior Openings
Expansion & Control Joints.
Bathroom and showers
Exterior Pool Caulking
Granite, Marble and Precast
Solarium & SunRooms
services:
Our Services

All of Omega Renovation's services are provided with the care and dedication that your home or development deserves. Every job undertaken is handled with the utmost care and precision to ensure that you get the neatest, cleanest caulking possible.
Indoor

Bathrooms (tiles, mirrors, vanities, bathtubs, shower recess)

Brickwork

profile:
Welcome to Tony's Restoration.  We offer a wide variety of services for Roofing, Countertops, Floor Laying & Refinishing. 

Our services are: Roofing Shingles, Flat Roofs, Soffits, Fascia, Eavestroughs, and Aluminum Siding Installation. 

Countertops - Installation including grout / sealing: for marble, tiles, granite, natural stone and terrazzo. 

Concrete Flooring - Polishing and Refinishing services. 

Floor Laying & Refinishing - Grinding, polishing, wash & seal, and installing. 

We offer onsite appointments and free estimates. 

We will be following all the health and safety protocals for Covid 19 by wearing masks, social distancing and having hand sanitizer handy.  Customers needs come first so if you feel more comfortable letting me come onsite and take some measurements, you don't have to be present for that.

profile:
Cali Flooring Ltd was founded by Oscar, who has more than 10  years of experience under his belt. Cali Flooring provides excellent services that's tailored to your needs. Cali Flooring specializes in installing and refinishing all types of hardwood floors, whether it is your oaks, maples, pines, or your exotics woods like bloodwood, cherry, mahogany, or even bamboo. We are one of the few flooring companies that specialize in inlay/border designs. We are fully insured and cater to both commercial and residents. Our skill and patience to create these masterpieces are above the rest.
‍
In order that there are no surprises during the installation, we list the items you should know ahead of time regarding preparation and our scheduling so you can plan and know what to expect.  You’ll have time to ask any questions and you can feel comfortable knowing that you will be involved in all the decisions.

During this time of the pandemic, we respect and ensure the safety of both our customers and our employees. We make sure we are operating with the necessary personal protective equipment.
name: Cali Flooring Ltd

profile:
Luxury Flooring Inc. has been a leading provider of flooring services for our valued customers for almost 15 years. Our expanding line of quality flooring products makes it easier and faster for you to improve the beauty and value of your home.

Customer satisfaction is our priority. We ensure the right solution for your flooring needs by providing range products of carpet, hardwood, laminate, vinyl tiles and vinyl sheets. We pride ourselves in providing any kind of repairs to your old carpet, and don’t forget about our next day installation.

As we consider our customer’s highest treatment, we offer a totally free under padding and special discounts for our seniors.

Because Luxury Flooring Inc is an exceptional partner for your flooring improvement needs, we proudly offer free estimates, highest quality products, professional consultation, and best Prices that match your budget.

Our Convenient shop at home service will help you add style and inspiration to your home. When viewing samples within your décor, you will be able to match colours, fabrics to ensure the right choice.

Liability, Honesty, and customer satisfaction are the main goal of our business. Our experienced and professional installers will handle every job with care, answer your questions and address your concerns.

If you’re looking to add warmth and quiet luxury to your home, Luxury Flooring Inc. is a wise choice! Call now: 416-450-0950

profile:
Located in Toronto, Coombes Flooring and Renovations Inc offers all types of services to help with your renovation needs! We offer top of the line service and committed to providing you the greatest service. Great team of employees focused and trained to provide you with the quality you expect. 

Offering services such as flooring (including laminate, hardwood, vinyl) , tiling (including custom showers, tub surrounds, and backsplash) , framing (including fences and decks), drywall, painting, and lots more!

Our number one value is keeping our customers happy and making sure the job is done right! and on time!

As a full-service contractor, we have the experience and proven skills to take on all your home renovation requirements and complete the project so it’s done right, on time and within budget.

At ARLEO Renovation & Contraction Inc., we strive to implement a long-term relationship with our clients, based on safety, quality, timely service and an anticipation of their needs. So, if there’s a renovation in your future, contact ARLEO Renovation & Contracting Inc. today, where 100% total satisfaction is guaranteed!
Our Home renovation business services mainly cover GTA area. Whether you live in Oakville, Hamilton, Mississauga, Brampton, Toronto or the surrounding area, trust your home renovation to The ARLEO Renovation & Contracting Inc.!

profile:
Toronto Epoxy Pros is a leader in the epoxy floor coating industry in Toronto & the GTA. We take your old floors and make them new. We specialize in commercial and industrial floors, as well as kitchens, garages, and warehouse applications.
We’re also seasoned with residential jobs such as your basement, garage, or anything else you need protected. No job is too big or too small for our professionals, who are all expertly-trained for a perfect epoxy coating – every time. Our materials are also 100% eco-friendly and release no Volatile Organic Compounds (VOCs). Contact us today for your quote and we will take care of your surfaces – your new floor is a mere phone call away!

profile:
Cutting Edge Flooring Inc.
416-838-3838
www.CuttingEdgeFlooring.ca

We would like to thank you for visiting our HomeStars review page and would like to welcome you to our family owned and operated flooring sales and installation business Cutting Edge Flooring Inc.  Our Staff and Installation Crews have been in the flooring and construction industry for over a decade and we are a company built and driven on Integrity . We believe in quality and customer satisfaction as we stand strong behind our reputation. We are a fully licenced and insured incorporated business and warranty all of our high quality services and installations. We offer Free Estimates and Free In Home Flooring Sales with a no pressure buying experience.  We only sell high quality products that we have used for many years.  We will help make your flooring visions a reality with quality products and services to meet any budget and by offering to beat any written estimate by any reputable company by 10%
